action.general_scene_description: The screenshot shows a calendar application open on a computer. The calendar is displaying the week of November 11th to 17th, 2024. The current date is Saturday, November 16th.  A pop-up window displays details of an event scheduled for Sunday, November 17th, titled "Client Meeting: Fujitsu" from 3 PM to 4 PM, with a note indicating it is an "Important Meeting with Boss".
action.mouse_action: The mouse cursor is hovering over the "Client Meeting: Fujitsu" event on Sunday, November 17th.
action.program_description: A calendar application is open and displaying the weekly view.
